title: NixImagery.github.io
text:
This is a collection of sites and repositories I publish and maintain for work, research, or personal interests.
Published sites here are related to my family tales, interdisciplinary learning at the Natural Partners Project, the 2020 Data Ethics MOOC run by the University of Edinburgh, and the remnants of the old Scottish Physics Teachers’ Resources site SPTR.
There is a public site about the BBC’s radio programme Something Understood.
I am a Lecturer at Edinburgh University and maintain an interest in programming and artificial intelligence. You can find my latest cv here (pdf, 100kB).
This site, like many others here, is a Quarto website. To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.
